data.name: Pre-Intern/Trainee
data.title: Apprentice (Java, Spring, JavaScript, MySQL)
content: Through comprehensive sessions with top executives, I’ve gained deep insights into {{investment fundamentals}}, {{primary and secondary markets}}, {{derivatives}}, and {{trading psychology}}, building a solid foundation in financial markets.

Currently, I’m applying this knowledge to develop {{XML2RDBMS}}, a tailored project aligned with the company’s core use case, receiving guidance and assessment from experienced mentors to ensure precision and impact.

data.name: Project Intern
data.title: Software Engineer Intern (Java, Spring, JNI, REST API, IText, Security Testing)
content: Architected a {{Digital Signature Certificate}} system using {{Java}}, {{Spring}}, and {{JNI}}, enhancing secure document signing and verification.
Integrated {{IText}} libraries with {{REST API}} for seamless PDF updates, improving operational efficiency by {{40%}} and data integrity.
Performed rigorous security testing with tools like {{JMeter}}, {{Burp Suite}}, and {{OWASP ZAP}}, identifying and mitigating {{15+}} critical vulnerabilities.

data.name: Content Writer
data.title: Content Developer & Strategist
content: Authored {{10+ articles}} and {{blog posts}} for IoT Lab’s website, collaborating with a {{team of 5}} to align content strategy with lab goals.
Achieved an {{80% alignment}} with reader interests, enhancing {{lab visibility}} and {{engagement}} within the tech community.
